TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Transform extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示抽象基底類別，可用於 XML 數位簽章的所有 項目都是自其衍生。

span.span: Represents the abstract base class from which all elements that can be used in an XML digital signature derive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當執行 XML 簽署和驗證，<`Transform`> 元素會描述如何簽署者轉換已簽署的資料物件。When performing XML signing and verification, the <`Transform`> element describes how the signer transformed the data object that was signed. 文件檢查器接著會使用 <`Transform`> 項目相同的方式轉換的帶正負號的資料。The verifier of a document then uses the <`Transform`> element to transform the signed data in the same manner. 如果驗證器無法轉換的帶正負號的資料相同的方式，就無法驗證文件。If the verifier cannot transform the signed data in the same manner, the document cannot be verified. 使用衍生自類別類別，每當您需要將一或多個轉換物件新增加密的 XML 文件或帶正負號的 XML 文件。Use a class that derives from the class whenever you need to add one or more transform objects to an encrypted XML document or to a signed XML document. 如需詳細資訊``項目，請參閱 XMLDSIG 規格，也就是可從在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 或可從位於 www.w3.org W3C XML 加密規格/ TR/xmlenc-core /。For more information about the `` element, see the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/, or the XML encryption specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Algorithm { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Algorithm : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定統一資源識別元 (URI)，它識別了目前轉換所執行的演算法。

span.span: Gets or sets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that identifies the algorithm performed by the current transform.

value.span: URL，辨識目前 物件所執行的演算法。

span.span: The URI that identifies the algorithm performed by the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會對應至屬性的``XMLDSIG 簽章中的項目。This property corresponds to the attribute of a `` element in an XMLDSIG signature. 比方說，此演算法的 URI Base64 解碼的轉換定義為http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#base64XMLDSIG 規格 （章節 6.6.2） 中。For example, the algorithm URI for the Base64 decoding transform is defined as http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#base64 in the XMLDSIG specification (Section 6.6.2). 為了方便起見，您可以設定此值使用其中一個相關聯的靜態欄位類別。You can conveniently set this value using one of the static fields associated with the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::XmlElement ^ Context { System::Xml::XmlElement ^ get(); void set(System::Xml::XmlElement ^ value); };
member this.Context : System.Xml.XmlElement with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 物件，表示目前 物件在其下執行的文件內容。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that represents the document context under which the current object is running.

value.span: 物件，表示目前 物件在其下執行的文件內容。

span.span: An object that represents the document context under which the current object is running.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當簽署文件、屬性表示的值傳遞至建構函式。When signing a document, the property represents the value passed to the constructor. 驗證文件時屬性表示物件。When verifying a document, the property represents object. 期間簽章計算和檢查，但在叫用轉換之前，會自動設定 「 屬性。The property is set automatically during signature computation and checking, but before transforms are invoked.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，則傳回 物件 (適合納入為 XMLDSIG 項目的子項目) 參數的 XML 表示。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns an XML representation of the parameters of the object that are suitable to be included as subelements of an XMLDSIG element.

returns.span: XML 節點的清單，代表 XMLDSIG 項目中描述目前 物件所需要的轉換特定內容。

span.span: A list of the XML nodes that represent the transform-specific content needed to describe the current object in an XMLDSIG element.

remarks.format: ## Examples 如果物件代表使用 XPath 運算式的 XPath 轉換`self::text()`，呼叫導致物件，表示下列的 XML 項目：If a object represents an XPath transform using the XPath expression `self::text()`,a call to results in an object that represents the following XML element: ``` self::text() ``` 這個項目對應至轉換特定內容的``區段 4.3.3.4 XMLDSIG 規格中所定義的項目。This element corresponds to the transform-specific content of the `` element as defined in Section 4.3.3.4 of the XMLDSIG specification. 上述的 XPath 轉換整個``項目如下所示：For the above XPath transform, the entire `` element is as follows: ``` self::text() ```

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，傳回目前特定型別 物件的輸出。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the output of the current object of the specified type.

returns.span: 做為指定型別之物件的目前 物件輸出。

span.span: The output of the current object as an object of the specified type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回目前轉換的輸出，執行先前的呼叫所設定的值之後方法。The method returns the output of the current transform after it is run on the value previously set by a call to the method. 傳回物件的類型必須是其中一項中的型別物件屬性。The type of the returned object must be one of the type objects in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所傳回的物件符合 XML 結構描述，如``區段 4.3.3.4 XMLDSIG 規格中定義的項目。The object returned by this method conforms to the XML Scheme for the `` element defined in Section 4.3.3.4 of the XMLDSIG specification.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property InputTypes As Type()
public: abstract property cli::array <Type ^> ^ InputTypes { cli::array <Type ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得型別的陣列，這些型別是目前 物件 方法的有效輸入。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets an array of types that are valid inputs to the method of the current object.

value.span: 目前 物件的有效輸入型別陣列；您可以只將其中一種型別的物件傳遞到目前 物件的 方法。

span.span: An array of valid input types for the current object; you can pass only objects of one of these types to the method of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回的陣列屬性必須包含至少一個項目，因為每個物件必須接受做為有效的輸入至少一個類型。The array returned by the property must contain at least one element because every object must accept at least one type as valid input. A物件通常會接受一或多個下列類型做為輸入： ， ，或。A object typically accepts one or more of the following types as input: , , or .

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property OutputTypes As Type()
public: abstract property cli::array <Type ^> ^ OutputTypes { cli::array <Type ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得型別的陣列，這些型別為目前 之 方法的可能輸出。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets an array of types that are possible outputs from the methods of the current object.

value.span: 目前 物件的有效輸出型別陣列；只有其中一種型別的物件會從目前 物件的 方法傳回。

span.span: An array of valid output types for the current object; only objects of one of these types are returned from the methods of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回的陣列屬性必須包含至少一個項目，因為每個轉換必須產生做為輸出的至少一個類型。The array returned by the property must contain at least one element because every transform must generate at least one type as output.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PropagatedNamespaces As Hashtable
public: property System::Collections::Hashtable ^ PropagatedNamespaces { System::Collections::Hashtable ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 物件，內含傳送至簽章的命名空間。

span.span: Gets or sets a object that contains the namespaces that are propagated into the signature.

value.span: 物件，內含傳送至簽章的命名空間。

span.span: A object that contains the namespaces that are propagated into the signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 命名空間用來區分不同文件中具有相同名稱的不同元素。XML namespaces are used to distinguish different elements in a document that have the same name. 的索引鍵屬性是命名空間前置詞和的值為命名空間統一資源識別元 (Uri)。The keys of the property are the namespace prefixes and the values are the namespace Uniform Resource Identifiers (URIs). 期間簽章計算和檢查，但在叫用轉換之前，會自動設定 「 屬性。The property is set automatically during signature computation and checking, but before transforms are invoked.

span.span: The property was set to .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::XmlResolver ^ Resolver { void set(System::Xml::XmlResolver ^ value); };

span.span: Sets the current object.
The current object.

value.span: 這個屬性預設值為 物件。

span.span: This property defaults to an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會解析外部 XML 資源，名為的統一資源識別元 (URI)。The class resolves external XML resources named by a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI). 如果您不信任的來源 XML 檔案，您可能不想允許 XML 檔，以存取由 URI 命名的電腦資源。If you do not trust the source of the XML file, you might not want to allow the XML file to access computer resources named by the URI. 屬性可讓您控制的電腦資源已藉由指定不同的 XML 檔案的存取層級物件。The property allows you to control the level of access that XML files have to computer resources by specifying different objects. 如果您不想允許任何存取權，您可以設定此屬性`null`(`Nothing` Visual Basic 中)。If you do not want to allow any access, you can set this property to `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
